achievements.title: Trooper
achievements.locked_details:
Duplicates taking over your Mac.
Find 5 GB of duplicates
and get rid of them.
achievements.unlocked_details:
5 GB of duplicates found.
Use the force of Gemini to find some more.

achievements.title: Captain
achievements.locked_details:
Duplicates taking over your Mac.
Find 25 GB of duplicates
and get rid of them.
achievements.unlocked_details:
25 GB of duplicates found.
Use the force of Gemini to find some more.

achievements.title: Commander
achievements.locked_details:
Duplicates taking over your Mac.
Find 150 GB of duplicates
and get rid of them.
achievements.unlocked_details:
150 GB of duplicates found.
Use the force of Gemini to find some more.

achievements.title: First-Timer
achievements.locked_details:
Welcome to Gemini.
Scan your storages for the first time.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've scanned your storages once.
Good start, keep it up.

achievements.title: Newbie Scanner
achievements.locked_details: Be sure to open Gemini again.
achievements.unlocked_details:
Gemini's been waiting for you.
You meet again, at last.

achievements.title: Habitual Scanner
achievements.locked_details:
Make scanning a habit.
Scan your storages twice.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've scanned your storages twice.
We see a pattern here.

achievements.title: Expert Scanner
achievements.locked_details:
You're a few scans away from becoming an expert.
Scan your storages 5 times.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've scanned your storages 5 times.
Keep running Gemini at full blast.

achievements.title: Savvy Commentator
achievements.locked_details:
Anything to say about Gemini?
Send your comments via Feedback.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've had your say. MacPaw has heard you.
Thanks for the feedback.

achievements.title: News Follower
achievements.locked_details:
Information is power.
Join our newsletter to stay in the know.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've joined the MacPaw side.
Thanks for following our news.

achievements.title: Space Liberator
achievements.locked_details:
Junk files are space wasters, too.
Get CleanMyMac to liberate your disk space.
achievements.unlocked_details:
Live long and prosper, space liberator!
You've got CleanMyMac to free up your disk space.

achievements.title: Data Protector
achievements.locked_details:
Privacy is a rule.
Get Hider 2 to secure private data.
achievements.unlocked_details:
Live long and prosper, data protector!
You've got Hider 2 to secure your data.

achievements.title: Drive Guardian
achievements.locked_details:
Protect external drives from invisible junk.
Get CleanMyDrive 2 to clean them up.
achievements.unlocked_details:
Live long and prosper, drive guardian!
You've got CleanMyDrive 2 to protect your drives.

achievements.title: File Encoder
achievements.locked_details:
Make your files impossible to decipher.
Get Encrypto to encode your X-files.
achievements.unlocked_details:
Live long and prosper, file encoder!
Youâ€™ve got Encrypto to encode your files.

achievements.title: Mac App Lord
achievements.locked_details:
Embrace the MacPaw force!
Get all MacPaw apps.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've got all MacPaw apps!
May they serve you well.

achievements.title: Duplicate Destroyer
achievements.locked_details:
You're gonna need a Gemini license
to destroy those duplicates.
achievements.unlocked_details:
Congratulations! You have a license
to destroy duplicates.

achievements.title: Music Explorer
achievements.locked_details:
Duplicate tunes invade your music space.
Scan iTunes to spot them.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've scanned your iTunes library.
Time to destroy those duplicate tunes.

achievements.title: Photos Explorer
achievements.locked_details:
Duplicate pics invade your photo space
Scan Photos to spot them.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've scanned your Photos library.
Time to destroy those duplicate pics.

achievements.title: Outer Space Explorer
achievements.locked_details:
Duplicate files invade your external drive.
Scan it to spot them.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've scanned your external drive.
Time to destroy those duplicate files.

achievements.title: Beginner Speaking
achievements.locked_details:
Tell the world you've destroyed some duplicates:
share your cleanup results.
achievements.unlocked_details:
First contact has been established.
You've shared your cleanup results once.

achievements.title: Veteran Speaking
achievements.locked_details:
Tell the world you've destroyed more duplicates:
share your cleanup results twice.
achievements.unlocked_details:
The word's getting out.
You've shared your cleanup results twice.

achievements.title: Master Speaking
achievements.locked_details:
Tell the world you've destroyed even more duplicates:
share your cleanup results 3 times.
achievements.unlocked_details:
Sharing like a master!
You've shared your cleanup results 3 times.

achievements.title: Novice Communicator
achievements.locked_details:
New rank or reward?
Share it to spread the word.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've spread the word about your new achievement.
Great job. But don't get cocky.

achievements.title: Ace Communicator
achievements.locked_details:
Got 2 achievements already?
Share them to spread the word.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've spread the word about 2 achievements.
Great job. But don't get cocky.

achievements.title: Pro Communicator
achievements.locked_details:
Got 5 achievements already?
Share them to spread the word.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've spread the word about 5 achievements.
Great job. But don't get cocky.

achievements.title: Buddy
achievements.locked_details:
Know someone who likes stellar apps?
Invite a friend to try Gemini.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've told a friend about Gemini.
Because that's what true comrades-in-arms do.

achievements.title: True Pal
achievements.locked_details:
Know someone who likes stellar apps?
Invite 2 friends to try Gemini.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've told 2 friends about Gemini.
Because that's what true comrades-in-arms do.

achievements.title: Real Friend
achievements.locked_details:
Know someone who likes stellar apps?
Invite 5 friends to try Gemini.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've told 5 friends about Gemini.
Because that's what true comrades-in-arms do.

achievements.title: Interface Traveler
achievements.locked_details:
Explore Gemini:
go through the workflow to see what it's got.
achievements.unlocked_details:
You've seen most of Gemini now,
but there's more to discover.

achievements.title: Gemi Master
achievements.locked_details:
Gemini can learn.
Tell it to remember your selection, and it will.
achievements.unlocked_details:
Congratulations, Master!
Gemini's algorithm you have trained.

achievements.title: Far Corners Voyager
achievements.locked_details:
Always exploring the far corners of apps?
Try clicking on the logo.
achievements.unlocked_details:
Wow, you boldly go where
no man has gone before.

achievements.title: Hidden Gem Finder
achievements.locked_details:
You'll find Gemini is full of surprises.
Can you spot the Easter Egg?
achievements.unlocked_details:
You do know where
to look for hidden gems.
